*In France: 1st avoidable cause of death = 75,000 deaths/year
**Tobacco is the 1<sup>rst</sup> preventable cause of cardiovascular death.
**1<sup>rst</sup> cardiovascular DRF in non-menopausal women
**Fetal death in utero
**Mortality from cancer (lung > other cancers) > cardiovascular disease > respiratory disease

question.question: What is the major contribution of smoking to mortality in France?
question.option_b: Mortality from cancer (lung > other cancers) > cardiovascular disease > respiratory disease
question.option_c: 1st cardiovascular disease risk factor in non-menopausal women
question.option_d: 1st avoidable cause of death, accounting for 120,000 deaths/year
